divs: Sighting Detailswent out facing west, maybe ten decgrees north. in the distance say like a figure 8, amber orb atop a white orb. no noise, seemed pretty far away. seemed like a rotating light in the white area. watched it for twenty min, went inside for a few min. went back out and still there. then just gone. no movement.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Avon
There were no other sightings in Avon on or around July 24th 2012
